718842f-a.text:
Chrystie Street, north from and including Rivington Street.
July 18, 1929.
P. L. Sperrc
718842f-a.folder: Chrystie Street & Rivington Street, Manhattan, NY

718838f-a.text:
Chrystie Street, west side, south from but not including Rivington Street, to but not including Delancey Street. The view also shows Rivington Street, west from Forsyth Street, to the Bowery. The clearance in the foreground is the site for the Roosevelt Park.
July 23, 1930
F. L. Sperr.
No Reproductions

February 14, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, at a later date from a different angle, north from but not including Delancey Street. In the foreground is the
clearance for Roosevelt Park.
January 16, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
